channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024090216
item.description:
Report X-2024090216

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-03
  • City: BELEN
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BURLINGTON NORTHERN RAILROAD HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SHPX 211450 was found by an FRA inspector in the Belen, NM yard with multiple securement issues including an open vapor valve with a missing plug. The valve was secured and plug properly installed as well as securing the rest of the minor issues. No liquid release, just vapor. The car was released back into transportation.
